body_html:
@vrv is there a way to check CPU/GPU capabilities of an operation from python? Something like print out a list of available backends for each operation?
Because I could update the documentation myself, but I was wondering if there is a more efficient way than just digging sources one operation at the time.

body:
@vrv is there a way to check CPU/GPU capabilities of an operation from python? Something like print out a list of available backends for each operation?
Because I could update the documentation myself, but I was wondering if there is a more efficient way than just digging sources one operation at the time.
